gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.runnables
Class Monitor<T>

java.lang.Object
  gr.interamerican.bo2.utils.runnables.Monitor<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of object being monitored.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Monitor<T>
extends Object
implements Runnable

The Monitor monitors an object. The Monitor is Runnable, that runs on its own thread and performs actions relevant to the monitored object. The monitor keeps running until its mustStop condition becomes true. The monitor periodically checks the stop condition and if it is true, then it executes the SimpleCommands that have been added to it.
The interval field specifies the time in milliseconds between the execution of the last SimpleCommand and the next check of the mustStop condition.
The monitored object provides the subject of the mustStop condition.
